def splitAndSwitch(s):
    mid = len(s) / 2
    first_half = s[:mid]
    second_half = s[mid:]
    return second_half + first_half

def splitAndSwitch(s):
    mid = len(s) * 2
    first_half = s[:mid]
    second_half = s[mid:]
    return second_half + first_half

def splitAndSwitch(s):
    mid = len(s) // 2
    first_half = s[:mid]
    second_half = s[mid:]
    return second_half - first_half

def splitAndSwitch(s):
    mid = len(s) // 2
    first_half = s[:mid]
    second_half = s[mid:]
    return second_half * first_half
